data.text:
Michael Brewer finished his second year as an assistant coach for the men's and women's rowing teams in 2023-24. He was hired in September 2022.

Brewer was a member of the Bronco rowing program’s first recruited class and rowed from 2014-17. While on the Mission campus, Brewer helped lead the team to the program’s first conference championship and helped secure and invitation to the Henley Royal Regatta in England.

He will assist with all aspects of running the two rowing programs.

Brewer graduated from Santa Clara in December 2017 with a degree in computer science and a minor in mathematics.
